name: gnome
description: A small mass of animate stone in the rough shape of a human, with clay for joints.  Two gemstone eyes regard you impassively.

special_attacks.monster_message: %1$s stomps heavily and the ground shakes!

name: black blood of the earth
description: A mass of black liquid with an iridescent sheen, flowing across the ground.  It smells strongly of freshly-turned soil.

death_function.message: The %s loses form and sinks into the earth.

special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s reaches for you with a liquid tentacle, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s reaches for <npcname> with a liquid tentacle, but they dodge!

special_attacks.hit_dmg_u: %1$s snaps a liquid tentacle at your %2$s!
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_u: %1$s's liquid tentacle lashes out at you without doing any damage.
special_attacks.no_dmg_msg_npc: %1$s's liquid tentacle lashes out at <npcname> without doing any damage.
special_attacks.miss_msg_u: %s's liquid tentacle snaps at you, but you dodge!
special_attacks.miss_msg_npc: %s's liquid tentacle snaps at <npcname>, but they dodge!
